item.title: Why Did GALT Shares Plummet Over 30% Today?
item.description: Galectin Therapeutics said it had received feedback from the FDA on its belapectin drug and also announced a new $10 million line of credit.

item.title: Amaze Appoints Joel Krutz, Former Paramount Global and Crown Electrokinetics Executive, as Chief Financial Officer
Fed's Williams Sees No Urgency To Cut Rates Again, Says November CPI Was 'Distorted' Downward Due To Technical Factors: Report
item.description: During an interview with CNBC, Williams said that the recent employment and inflation data did little to change his monetary policy outlook.
